text: Özhan Çıvgın (born June 6, 1979) is a Turkish professional basketball coach who is now coaching Turkish Basketball League team Arel Üniversitesi Büyükçekmece. ==External links== *Özhan Çıvgın Maçkolik Profile *Tüyap Büyükçekmece Career History Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Karşıyaka basketball coaches Category:Turkish basketball coaches
title: Özhan Çıvgın
